X.i.4.B.5.d
.
Time Limit
To be eligible for the one-time FVEC payment, VA must have received the FVEC application
no later than
February 16, 2010.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section B - Eligibility for Benefits Based on Philippines Service
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section B
